Package elevator.rmi.impl

Provides classes implementing remote interfaces defined in the elevator.rmi package for controlling components of elevators (motors, doors and scales) and for monitoring elevator and floor buttons as well as positions of moving elevators via Java RMI.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DoorImpl The class DoorImpl implements the elevator.rmi.Door remote interface.
DoorsImpl The class DoorsImpl implements the remote interface elevator.rmi.Doors used for controlling doors of elevators via RMI.
ElevatorImpl The class ElevatorImpl implements the remote interface elevator.rmi.Elevator that is used for controlling a motor, a scale (level indicator) and a door of an elevator via RMI.
ElevatorsImpl The class ElevatorsImpl implements the remote interface elevator.rmi.Elevators that is used for controlling motors, scales (level indicators) and doors of all elevator via RMI.
FloorListener The helper class FloorListener that implements the java.awt.event.ActionListener interface for receiving action events from floor buttons.
GetAllImpl The class implements the GetAll remote interface that provides references to components of elevators to be controlled via RMI.
InsideListener The helper class InsideListener that implements the java.awt.event.ActionListener interface for receiving action events from an inside button panel of one elevator with a given number or from inside panels of all elevators.
MotorImpl The class MotorImpl implements the elevator.rmi.Motor remote interface.
MotorsImpl The MotorsImpl class implements the remote interface elevator.rmi.Motors used for controlling all motors of elevators via RMI.
PositionListener The helper class PositionListener that implements the java.awt.event.ActionListener interface for receiving action events from an the elevator timer and create an action event with a current position of one elevator with a given number or all elevators (special case).
ScaleImpl The class ScaleImpl implements the elevator.rmi.Scale remote interface.
ScalesImpl The class ScalesImpl implements the remote interface elevator.rmi.Scales used for controlling floor indicators (scales) of elevators via RMI.
VelocityListener The helper class that implements the javax.swing.event.ChangeListener interface for receiving change events from an the elevators' velocity slider.
 

Package elevator.rmi.impl Description

Provides classes implementing remote interfaces defined in the elevator.rmi package for controlling components of elevators (motors, doors and scales) and for monitoring elevator and floor buttons as well as positions of moving elevators via Java RMI.

The "primary" class among these classes is the GetAllImpl class. This class implements the elevator.rmi.GetAll interface used by the MakeAll class to obtain remote references (stubs) to components of elevators. An object with the GetAllImpl class is created when the Elevators application starts with the "-rmi" option and a reference to the GetAllImpl object with the GetAll remote interface is bound at the rmiregistry to the "GetAll" name. Any static method of the MakeAll class used at a controller application looks up the GetAll reference at the rmiregistry (if it's not found yet by some other method) and uses the obtained stub to get a remote reference(s) to elevator components such as motors, doors, scales with appropriate interfaces such as Motor, Door, Elevator, defined in the elevator.rmi package.

Objects (servants) with classes implementing these remote interfaces (MotorImpl, DoorImp, etc.) are created by the GetAllImpl object on demand. When a servant receives a control command from the controller, it uses the ElevatorIO object to get or to alter the state of the target elevator component(s). The state of elevators (the Model part of the Elevators application) is represented by the array of objects with the elevator.Elevator class .
